attributes.description: True if months are allowed in the constrained Duration.
attributes.name: months_allowed

attributes.description: True if days are allowed in the constrained Duration.
attributes.name: days_allowed

attributes.description: True if hours are allowed in the constrained Duration.
attributes.name: hours_allowed

attributes.description: True if minutes are allowed in the constrained Duration.
attributes.name: minutes_allowed

attributes.description: True if fractional seconds are allowed in the constrained Duration.
attributes.name: fractional_seconds_allowed

attributes.description: The value to assume if this item is not included in data, due to being part of an optional structure.
attributes.name: assumed_value

meta_info.description: ISO 8601-compatible constraint on instances of Duration. In ISO 8601 terms, constraints might are of the form “PWD” (weeks and/or days), “PDTHMS” (days, hours, minutes, seconds) and so on.
meta_info.name: C_DURATION
